bass_scales_major.title: Bass Buttons Major Scale
bass_scales_major.description: Play up the Major Scale until you hit the root note again. Then go back down until you hit the root note. Repeat.

bass_scales_minor.title: Bass Buttons Minor Scale
bass_scales_minor.description: Play up the Minor Scale until you hit the root note again. Then go back down until you hit the root note. Repeat. Do this in two different ways: With the root note on the counterbass row and with the root note on the bass row.
